footer.cookieDisclaimer: When you visit and interact with our website, services or tools, we or our service providers may use cookies for storing information to help provide you with a better, faster and safer experience and for marketing purposes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: Privacy Policy | YulaSanta
meta.description: Information about YulaSanta's privacy policy and data security.

privacy.intro: At YulaSanta, we care deeply about your privacy. This policy explains how your data is handled when you use our website.
privacy.dataDesc: YulaSanta only stores the names you enter for creating draws in your browser's local storage (localStorage). This data is not transmitted to our servers and remains only on your device.
privacy.cookiesDesc: Our site displays Google AdSense advertisements. Google and its advertising partners may use cookies to serve ads based on your interests.
privacy.securityDesc: Since your data is only stored in your browser, all drawing information is deleted when you clear your browser history or data.
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We use world-class services such as Google Analytics and Google AdSense. These services have their own privacy policies.

legal.title: Legal Information

meta.title: Legal Information | YulaSanta
meta.description: Terms of use and legal notices of the YulaSanta platform.

legal.intro: This page contains legal notices and terms of use for the YulaSanta platform.
legal.usageDesc: YulaSanta is a drawing tool for entertainment and organizational purposes. Results are determined by random algorithms and contain no bias.
legal.liabilityDesc: YulaSanta cannot be held responsible for the results of drawings conducted on the platform or any technical malfunctions that may occur.
legal.contentDesc: All design and code rights on the site belong to the YulaSanta team. Unauthorized copying or use is prohibited.
legal.contactDesc: For any questions regarding legal matters, you can contact us using the support button.

meta.title: About Us | YulaSanta - Free Online Giveaway Platform
meta.description: Learn about YulaSanta. The most reliable free online giveaway and Secret Santa platform.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: YulaSanta is a free platform designed to make giveaways easy for everyone. From social media giveaways to Secret Santa organizations, we cover all your needs.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: YulaSanta was born in 2024 when a group of software developers asked 'why is running a giveaway so difficult?' We noticed that existing giveaway tools were either too complex, expensive, or unreliable.
story.p2: Our goal was simple: to enable everyone to run giveaways for free, securely, and easily. We developed specialized tools for popular platforms like Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and Twitter. We also created a perfect matching system for Secret Santa.
story.p3: Today, thousands of users choose YulaSanta. From holiday giveaways to brand campaigns, from friend groups to large communities, everyone runs their giveaways with YulaSanta.

free.title: 100% Free
free.desc: All our features are completely free. No hidden fees, premium memberships, or credit cards required.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.desc: Your data is stored only in your browser. We don't send any personal information to our servers.

fast.title: Super Fast
fast.desc: Run giveaways in seconds. Start immediately without registration or passwords.

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.desc: With a simple and intuitive interface, anyone can easily run a giveaway.

global.title: Multi-language Support
global.desc: We serve in Turkish, English, German, French, and 8 more languages.

passion.title: Made with Passion
passion.desc: We carefully design and continuously improve every feature.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To make running giveaways accessible, fair, and fun for everyone. We want to bring people together with the power of technology and make special moments even more special.

cta.title: Ready to Run Your Giveaway?
cta.desc: Create your giveaway for free right now. No registration required, no password needed.

meta.title: Contact | YulaSanta - Get in Touch
meta.description: Get in touch with YulaSanta. Write to us for your questions, suggestions, or partnership proposals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're happy to help. You can reach us by filling out the form below or by sending an email directly.
